    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Card​(java.awt.Color faceColor)
      Class constructor that creates a Card object giving it a face color determined by the board and sets it to be face down.

      Public method that paints the current Card object with its appropriate faceColor and sets the class variable isFaceUp to true.

      Public method that overrides the built-in toString() method to return the current Card's faceColor.
